Title: Andela: Your career destination is here
Body:
Cloudsmith is the leading Continuous Packaging platform for engineers looking to set up a secure, cloud-native artifact repository in 60 seconds. Cloudsmith offers support for 28+ formats, has 225 points of presence, and integrates with all of the tools you already use and love. When it comes to securing your software supply chain in the Cloud, we've got you covered!

**Ready to learn more?**

- Download our latest O'Reilly Report: [**The Rise of Continuous Packaging**](https://cloudsmith.com/developers/resources/the-rise-of-continuous-packaging)
- [Schedule a demo](https://calendly.com/d/cmm-7s5-bwj/cloudsmith-demo)
- Sign up for a [free 14-day trial](https://cloudsmith.com/signup/) (no credit card required!)
- Explore our [Cloudsmith guides](https://help.cloudsmith.io/docs) to help you easily get started
- We're hiring! Check out our open positions [here](https://apply.workable.com/cloudsmith)

[![](./assets/custom/cloudsmith_banner.PNG)](https://cloudsmith.com/signup)

Title: The End-to-End SRE Platform
Body:
####Blameless provides engineering teams with an end-to-end SRE platform that empowers teams to optimize reliability without compromising innovation velocity. By streamlining incident response, DevOps and SRE teams continuously learn, improve and stay resilient.

* [Join our SRE community Slack channel](https://www.blameless.com/slack-community)
* [Try Blameless Now](https://www.blameless.com/try-now)
* [Schedule Demo](https://www.blameless.com/schedule-demo)
* [Resilience in Action podcast featuring John Allspaw](https://www.blameless.com/podcast/resilience-in-action-e14-resilience-is-the-audacity-of-adaptive-capacity-ft-john-allspaw)
* [Check out our SRE blog](https://www.blameless.com/sre)
* Subscribe to Blameless on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1O9RGv3FGJau091DD09ooQ)
* Participate in a raffle - [win Beats Solo Wireless](https://info.blameless.com/raffle-conf42-incident-management)!

Make sure to check out the latest SRE article - [Elephant in the Blameless War Room: Accountability](https://www.blameless.com/sre/elephant-in-the-blameless-war-room-accountability?utm_campaign=TS-21Q3-Conf42%3ASRE&utm_source=Conf42-SRE&utm_medium=virtual-booth-blog-elephant-war-room)

#### [Blameless](https://www.blameless.com) - Platinum Sponsor of [Conf42 Incident Management 2022](https://www.conf42.com/im2022)

Title: Cloud Native Chaos Engineering Workshop by ChaosNative
Body:
##Workshop Overview

Chaos Engineering has evolved in the past few years with the development of the Cloud-Native paradigm.  Chaos testing is seen as a must for all Cloud-Native practitioners emphasizing reliability as a container challenge.  With the introduction of the LitmusChaos tool which helps curate Cloud-Native Chaos Engineering in a controlled way, practicing Chaos has become easier. Belonging to the CNCF ecosystem, Litmus stresses upon applying Chaos Engineering to modern architectures and building resilient applications simultaneously. The features and ideas majorly surround Community Collaboration, Observability, GitOps, Open APIs & much more. This talk stresses on the evolution of Chaos Engineering with the introduction of the LitmusChaos 2.0

##Target Audience

This workshop is intended for SREs, DevOps practitioners, Developers, Software Engineers, Students, and anyone else who is interested in learning the art and value of chaos engineering and resilience. This workshop also includes a certification option. You have a chance to become a __LitmusChaos Certified Chaos Practitioner__.

## Setup Details

The labs for the workshop will be on an online platform, all we require is a stable internet connection.

## Speakers

- Sayan Mondal, Software Engineer, ChaosNative

- Neelanjan Manna, Software Engineer, ChaosNative

##[Register for the Workshop](https://www.chaosnative.com/cnce-workshop)!

Title: Universal Artifact Management, Made Simple with Cloudsmith
Build reliable and innovative software at scale
Body:
####Cortex is a Software Engineering Platform that helps engineering teams build higher quality software by providing them visibility into complex service architectures and giving them the tools required to establish a culture of service reliability and ownership, drive adoption of best practices, and accelerate developer velocity

* [Learn more](https://www.cortex.io/products/scorecard/?utm_source=conf42) about how Cortex helps teams establish best practices

Read about [how to improve your influence as an SRE](https://www.cortex.io/post/4-ways-to-improve-your-influence-as-an-sre/?utm_source=conf42)

#### [Cortex](https://www.cortex.io) - Platinum Sponsor of [Conf42 SRE 2021](https://www.conf42.com/sre2021)

Title: Incident management for every developer
Body:
####Incidents impact everyone, not just SREs. FireHydrant gives teams the tools to maintain service catalogs, respond to incidents, communicate through status pages, and learn with retrospectives.

* [How FireHydrant Works](https://firehydrant.com/how-it-works)
* [Create your free account](https://app.firehydrant.io/registrations/new)
* [Watch a free demo](https://firehydrant.com/demo)
* Check out the [pricing](https://firehydrant.com/pricing)
* Get inspired while reading the [Blog](https://firehydrant.com/blog)

#### [FireHydrant](https://firehydrant.com) - Diamond Sponsor of [Conf42 Incident Management 2022](https://www.conf42.com/im2022)

Title: Microsoft Azure at Conf42 Golang 2022
Body:
![](./assets/sponsors/microsoft.png)

Microsoft wants to help the Golang community grow.

They are missing the opportunity to meet with Go developers in person this year, and they are putting all our energy into connecting virtually.

Meanwhile, Microsoft invites you to check the technical resources below:

* __[Microsoft Azure](https://aka.ms/AzureAtConf42Golang2022) at Conf42 Golang 2022__

Learn to use the Azure SDK for Go, browse API references, sample code, tutorials, quick-starts, conceptual articles and more.

![](./assets/custom/Conf42-Golang2022_31032022.png)

* __[Azure Heroes](https://aka.ms/AzureHeroesAtConf42Golang) at Conf42 Golang 2022__

Blockchain-based digital badges (NFTs). A fun way to earn digital collectibles for inclusive behaviour and meaningful impact in the technical community. Your unique badger is very special and cryptographically secured by the blockchain (independent of the Azure Heroes programme) so it requires a blockchain wallet to safely store it.

![](./assets/custom/AzureHeroesQRCode.png)

* __[Cloud Skills Challenge](https://aka.ms/MicrosoftAzureAtConf42Golang) - Golang 2022__

Free course @ Microsoft LEARN! Learn all things about how to safeguard your cloud resources!

#### [Microsoft](https://aka.ms/AzureAtConf42Golang2022) - Gold Sponsor of [Conf42 Golang 2022](https://www.conf42.com/golang2022)
